# `git-hooks`

Git hooks management and installation

## Usage

```bash
sc git-hooks
```

## Examples

```bash
sc git-hooks install
```

```bash
sc git-hooks status
```

```bash
sc git-hooks pre-commit
```

## Category

**General**
